title: Abandon Gaming Academy Team Looking For Jungler Mid and Support
body:
Hi all! I'm AG Colossus and I'm apart of Abandon Gaming I'm also 16 years old

We're a part of 3 mini-LCS style tournaments right now, and we're looking to field another roster to join us in these leagues.

Why should I join Abandon Gaming?
We're here to offer you the best possible competitive experience that low elo LoL can bring you. We have 2 Diamond 4 coaches willing to work with you on a team, and individual basis to ensure you are becoming the best you can be at your role. We also offer a fun and competitive scrim environment where (on your practice days) you can scrim us and the other teams we have listed as scrim partners. We make sure that teams are working as professionally as possible as well. This meaning you will have set practice times, go over champion pools and comps that work well for your team, VOD reviews, researching enemy teams, etc.

As of now we are looking for every role. We are only accepting people who are a minimum of Silver+. Post an application and I will get back to you.
DO NOT ADD ME. YOU ADD ME, I'LL BLOCK YOU SO DAMN FAST SON LEMME TELL YA.

Also the team I'm trying to gather I would like you to have really open schedules everyday so we can practice a lot. Fyi the teams ages so far is 16 and 15

IGN -
Age -
Role -
Rank -
Access to discord? -
Availability (weeks and weekends) -
